Disk Partitioning

  1. Partitioning method: Guided - use entire disk and set up encrypted LVM
  2. Select disk to partition: <sdX>
  3. Partitioning scheme: All files in one partition (recommended for new users)
  4. Write the changes to disks and configure LVM? Yes
  5. Encryption passphrase: <NEW-LUKS-PASSWORD>
  6. Amount of volume group to use for guided partitioning: max
  7. Finish partitioning and write changes to disk
  8. Write changes to disks? Yes
